<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Restricted">[Flashy Disappearance](/Spells.aspx?ID=1285)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 89</row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You create a puff of colorful smoke that quickly disperses while you become temporarily [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26). You become [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) to all creatures unless they can see invisible creatures. You Stride. At the end of your movement, if you have [cover, greater cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459), or [concealment](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), attempt a [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) check to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62). You gain a +2 status bonus to this Stealth check. The invisibility then ends, and you either become [observed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=27) or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) to creatures as determined by your check to Hide, if you made one.
name: Flashy Disappearance
